mongochat

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • mongochat.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a chat message, that is convenient to use with mongoDB collections.
    Author:
    Manuel Batsching

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Message(org.bson.Document messageDocument)
      Constructs a Message from a BSON Document, that has the following structure: "date" : date, "text" : text, "userName" : userName
      Message(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String userName)
      Constructs a Message from a message text and user name.
      Message(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String userName, java.util.Date date)
      Constructs a Message from a message text, userName and date.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Date getDate() 
      java.lang.String getText() 
      java.lang.String getUserName() 
      org.bson.Document toDocument() 
      java.lang.String toJson() 
      java.lang.String toString()
      Formats the current Message in a "chat-style", that can be conveniently displayed to the user in the client output stream.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String text,
               java.lang.String userName)
        Constructs a Message from a message text and user name. The date is set to the point at which the Message gets created.
        Parameters:
        text - a String that represents the message text
        userName - a String that represents the user name

      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String text,
               java.lang.String userName,
               java.util.Date date)
        Constructs a Message from a message text, userName and date.
        Parameters:
        text - a String that represents the message text
        userName - a String that represents the user name
        date - a Date that represents the time that should be used with the message.

      • Message

        public Message(org.bson.Document messageDocument)
        Constructs a Message from a BSON Document, that has the following structure:

        "date" : date, "text" : text, "userName" : userName

        Parameters:
        messageDocument - A Document from a mongoDB Collection.

    • Method Detail

      • getDate

        public java.util.Date getDate()
        Returns:
        Date

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        Returns:
        the message text as String

      • getUserName

        public java.lang.String getUserName()
        Returns:
        the user name as String

      • toJson

        public java.lang.String toJson()
        Returns:
        a representation of the current Message object as JSON-String

      • toDocument

        public org.bson.Document toDocument()
        Returns:
        a representation of the current Message object as a Document from a mongoDB Collection

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Formats the current Message in a "chat-style", that can be conveniently displayed to the user in the client output stream. For example:

        "Foobert (29.4.15 04:08): The truth value of this sentence is false."

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a representation of the current Message object as String
        See Also:
        Object.toString()
